instructions: Be sure to include your birthdate and signature.

questions.question: Have you bought any brands other than your usual in the PAST 3 MONTHS?
How do you usually purchase cigarettes?
Which of the following best describes the way you use coupons to buy your USUAL BRAND of cigarettes?
options: I never use coupons to buy my Usual Brand
I use coupons as often as I can to buy my Usual Brand
I only buy my Usual Brand with a coupon
I never get coupons for my Usual Brand

questions.question: Are you currently saving packs, proofs of purchase, UPC codes, or 'funny money' for any cigarette brand?
In the past six months, have you sent any packs, proofs of purchase, UPC codes, or 'funny money' to get merchandise?

response_note: RESPONSE WILL NOT BE PROCESSED WITHOUT SIGNATURE AND BIRTHDATE
legal_note: I understand that giving false information in order to accept these offers may constitute a violation of law.
